comments:
Given an existing project named 'Test',
1. Start 'New Java Project' Wizard
2. Enter name 'test'.
3. Click Finish.
4. Error Dialog "..A resource exists with different case: /Test."
5. Click OK
6. Enter any other name i.e. 'foo'
7. Click Finish
8. Error dialog appears, NPE in LOG.
